name: Dreamcore Visual Novel
description:
Welcome to this dreamcore visual novel! It's still in development sadly. I got this game idea from playing BBirthday from Yun Seven.

Storyline

You walk into a neighborhood and you seem confused. Don't worry! There is Naveah to company you! Naveah is really evil kind! But your objective is to get out of this neighborhood and wake up have fun and just relax!
